attributes.action: Process to Close the Scottish Parliament by Scotland Act referendum
attributes.additional_details: The parliament and Government is  not accountable to the scottish citizens or the institutions who are appointed to scrutinize its legal operation, creating the risk national security , organised crime  and suppression of individual UK citizen democracy . the people should choose .
attributes.background: UK Parliament Set in motion the terms in the scotland act to hold a referendum to consider closing the Scottish Parliament  as legal process allows.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/606015
